titleStmt.title: The excellency of a gracious spirit Deliuered in a treatise upon the 14. of Numbers, verse 24. By Ier. Burroughes minister of Gods Word.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for R. Dawlman, and L. Fawne, at the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard,
